subject: Wilderness Areas
Forests and Forestry
lead_paragraph: Clarence Petty turns from his typewriter with the half-written letter to Eliot Spitzer, the new governor of New York, and says issues such as letting snowmobiles into state-owned forests should be decided by the people, not a handful of officials.
snippet: Clarence Petty turns from his typewriter with the half-written letter to Eliot Spitzer, the new governor of New York, and says issues such as letting snowmobiles into state-owned forests should be decided by the people, not a handful of officials.
